import React, { useState } from 'react'; import logo from './../../assets/tesla-logo.png'; import './header.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faCircleQuestion, faCircleUser } from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons'; import { faGlobe } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import NavModal from './navModal/NavModal'; function Header() { const [ isSubmenuVisible, setIsSubmenuVisible ] = useState(false); const [ activeMenuTab, setActiveMenuTab ] = useState(); const onHover = ({ target }) => { setActiveMenuTab(target.id) } const onClose = () => { setIsSubmenuVisible(false); } return (

onClose()}>

    setIsSubmenuVisible(true)}>
    onClose()}>
); } export default Header;
